ComicInfo.Summary:
At Hunte Castle final preparations are made for the arrival of the conqueror worm.
Roger the Homunculus teams with Lobster Johnson (who may or may not be alive) to battle a laboratory full of mechanical corpses, while Hellboy is tortured by a big Nazi gorilla.
